Class HeaderFileManager.PFile

  xtc.lang.cpp.HeaderFileManager.Include
      xtc.lang.cpp.HeaderFileManager.PFile
Enclosing class:
HeaderFileManager
public class HeaderFileManager.PFile
extends HeaderFileManager.Include

A struct to encapsulate the data associated with a regular header.

checkGuard

public boolean checkGuard()
Check for guard macro. Get the guard macro name with getGuard().

Returns:
true if the header has a guard.

getGuard

public String getGuard()
Return the guard macro name if it has one. Must be called after checkGuard.

Returns:
the guard macro name, null otherwise.
